duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading a team to improve quality, yields and COGs through project management and hands-on execution.
Setting departmental and individual performance goals, organizing workflow, and ensuring employee understanding of goals and deliverables.
Monitoring employee productivity, providing constructive feedback and performance coaching.
Developing and implementing techniques and technology to improve fermentation quality.
Designing and implementing strategies to improve efficiencies, reduce yield loss, and improve COGs.
Ensuring departmental compliance with established GMP, safety, and quality standards.
Representing departments in GMP audits as necessary.
Conducting investigations, collaborating with other departments as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Science or Engineering (Master's preferred)
